text: Aasmaano ke raaston tak, aur Moosa ke khuda ko jhaank kar dekhun.Mujhey to yeh Moosa jhoota hi maloom hota hai.â€ Is tarah Firoun ke liye uski badh-amali khushnuma bana di gayi aur woh raah e raast se roak diya gaya. Firoun ki saari chaalbaazi (uski apni) tabahi ke raaste hi mein sarf (use/istemal) hui
